channel.title: Hi, I'm Javier and I'm starting my first SaaS
channel.description:
Hi all,
Like others I have seen here, I was also a lurker in the BoS forums for the better part of the last 10 years. During all that time I have been wanting to run my own SaaS and I'm happy to say I'm finally getting started!

item.title: Hi, I'm Javier and I'm starting my first SaaS
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Welcome to the forums Javier, and good luck with your first app. Let us know how it goes!

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I'm Javier and I'm starting my first SaaS
